Package Entities

Class TableOrders

java.lang.Object
Entities.TableOrders
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TableOrders extends Object implements Serializable
TableOrders class represents a delivery order (Entity) It has fields for the information of the order.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • TableOrders

      public TableOrders(int CustomerID, int OrderID, String RecieverName, String RecieverAddress, String RecieverPhone, Date OrderDate, Time OrderTime, String Status, Date EstimatedDate, Time EstimatedTime)
      Constructor for TableOrders object.
      Parameters:
      CustomerID - the ID of the customer who placed the order
      OrderID - the ID of the order
      RecieverName - the name of the customer
      RecieverAddress - the destination address specified in the order
      RecieverPhone - the phone number of the customer
      OrderDate - the date the order was placed
      OrderTime - the time the order was placed
      Status - the status of the order
      EstimatedDate - the estimated date of delivery
      EstimatedTime - the estimated time of delivery

  • Method Details

    • convertdate

      public LocalDate convertdate(Date date)
      Converts a sql.date to LocalDate. It adds 1 day (because mysql-connector-java-8.0.13.jar wrong date retrieval)
      Parameters:
      date - the date to convert
      Returns:
      the converted LocalDate

    • converttime

      public LocalTime converttime(Time time)
      Converts a sql.time to LocalTime. It adds 3.5 hours (because mysql-connector-java-8.0.13.jar wrong time retrieval)
      Parameters:
      time - the date to convert
      Returns:
      the converted LocalTime
